summary: Website for video editing where users can upload videos, apply basic edits, and export the result.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal film-strip + scissors logo on transparent background (logo-video-editor.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero illustration showing a stylized video timeline and playhead (hero-video-editing.dim_1600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive single-page video editor UI that lets users select a local video file, previews it in-browser, and shows an editing workspace with a timeline/trim controls and a properties panel.
Implement basic editing tools that operate on the loaded video and are reflected immediately in the preview: trim (in/out), mute/unmute audio, and playback speed (e.g., 0.5xâ€“2x).
Add an export flow that renders/produces an output video using the current edit settings and provides a downloadable file to the user, with progress indication and graceful error handling.
Connect the frontend to the backend so users can name a project, save current edit settings, and reopen a saved project to restore settings in the editor UI.

Apply a cohesive, creative visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and use it consistently across the landing/editor screens without using a blue/purple primary palette.
Render the generated static images (logo and hero/illustration) from frontend/public/assets/generated in the UI (e.g., app header/landing area).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a web-based video editing app with upload, basic editing tools, and export functionality
Add a lightweight backend model for saving and listing editing projects (metadata only), including project name, created/updated timestamps, and the edit settings (trim in/out, mute, playback speed).

projectName: Web-based video editing website (upload, basic edits, export)
